title: FS: T206 John Titus SGC 30 Sweet Caporal
author: wazoo

posts.post_title: FS: T206 John Titus SGC 30 Sweet Caporal
posts.post_content:
Hi all, it's time to sell Mr. Titus. It's a gorgeous card. Nice Sweet Cap back too. Looking to get $225 for Titus, delivered. I am open to trade offers as well. Please let me know what you think. If you need closer up photos, I can send you an email with pictures from my phone. Thank you!

Wazoo
It's been a long time since I've posted....Hope all you guys are doing well. How about $225 for Mr. Titus? Still open to offers if I'm off on price.

where you been??:confused:

I'm sure super busy! great to see you post:)
